title.rendered: Université Laval Acceptance Rate, GPA, TOEFL, IELTS Requirements & Application

content.rendered:
Learn about Université Laval acceptance rate, GPA requirements, and English language proficiency requirements (including TOEFL and IELTS) for international students. Get details on the application process, admission requirements, and score breakdown for each test.

The Université Laval Admission application for 2024 intake is currently open for late application, until December 1, for some courses and in some Universities. Please check the notice board below to search for deadlines. To apply for the Université Laval, Winter 2024 admission, kindly follow this link.

The management of Université Laval wishes to let all prospective students of the University know that admission for the 2024 intake is ongoing. All domestic and international students can now apply.

What to Know About the Université Laval Winter Admission 2024?

The Université Laval Winter Admission 2024 portal is designed to receive students’ applications for Winter admission. The application processes and admission requirements are available on the university website.

Click here to read more

Universite Laval Acceptance Rate

According to the latest available data, the acceptance rate for undergraduate programs at Laval University is around 53%. For graduate programs, the acceptance rate varies widely by program, with some programs being highly selective and others being more open. Overall, Laval University is considered to be a moderately selective institution.

Laval university GPA Score

Laval University uses a 4.3 GPA scale for admission purposes, where an A+ is worth 4.3, an A is worth 4.0, an A- is worth 3.7, a B+ is worth 3.3, a B is worth 3.0, a B- is worth 2.7, a C+ is worth 2.3, a C is worth 2.0, a C- is worth 1.7, a D+ is worth 1.3, a D is worth 1.0, and an F is worth 0.0.

When calculating GPA for admission to Laval University, the university looks at the grades obtained in the courses that are required for admission to the program of interest. Each program has its own set of required courses, and some programs may place more weight on certain courses or areas of study. It is also important to note that some programs may require a minimum GPA in addition to the completion of specific courses.

Laval University TOEFL Score Requirements

Laval University accepts several English language proficiency tests, including the TOEFL, IELTS, CAEL, and others. For the TOEFL, Laval University requires a minimum score of 80 on the internet-based test (iBT), with a minimum score of 20 in each section (reading, listening, speaking, and writing).

The TOEFL score breakdown is as follows:

  • Reading: 20-30
  • Listening: 20-30
  • Speaking: 20-30
  • Writing: 20-30

To meet Laval University’s minimum TOEFL score requirement, a student must score at least 20 in each of the four sections, with a total score of at least 80. However, some programs may require a higher TOEFL score or may place more weight on certain sections.

Laval University IELTS Score Requirements

Laval University accepts the IELTS (International English Language Testing System) as an English language proficiency test. For admission purposes, Laval University requires a minimum overall band score of 6.5, with a minimum band score of 6.0 in each section.

The IELTS score breakdown is as follows:

  • Listening: 6-9
  • Reading: 6-9
  • Writing: 6-9
  • Speaking: 6-9

To meet Laval University’s minimum IELTS score requirement, a student must score at least 6.0 in each of the four sections, with an overall band score of at least 6.5. However, some programs may require a higher IELTS score or may place more weight on certain sections.

Laval University Majors

Université Laval offers a wide range of undergraduate and graduate programs across various faculties and schools. Some of the major faculties and schools at Université Laval include:
  • Faculty of Arts and Humanities
  • Faculty of Law, Politics, and Economics
  • Faculty of Medicine
  • Faculty of Science and Engineering
  • Faculty of Social Sciences
  • School of Architecture
  • School of Business
  • School of Education
  • School of Forest, Geography, and Geomatics
  • School of Music
  • School of Nursing
  • School of Psychology

How to Apply for Admission into Université Laval Undergraduate Programme

  • Visit the Université Laval Application Portal
  • Complete your application
  • Submit academic transcript
  • Pay all application fees
  • Submit your application.
  • Monitor Application Status.

Note:

For making updates to the choice of program, courses, and so on, students must adhere to deadlines for dropping and adding courses and to ensure that your program of study is complete and up-to-date.

 

Other Scholars Asked

FAQ Answers

What is the admission process for Laval University?

 The admission process for Laval University varies depending on the level of study (undergraduate or graduate) and the program of interest. Generally, the process involves submitting an application, providing transcripts and other required documents, and meeting the program-specific admission requirements.

What are the admission requirements for Laval University?

 Admission requirements for Laval University vary by program, but generally include meeting academic prerequisites, providing transcripts, submitting language test scores (if applicable), and meeting any additional program-specific requirements

What is the minimum GPA required for admission to Laval University?

 The minimum GPA required for admission to Laval University varies by program, but generally, a minimum GPA of 2.0 on a 4.0 scale is required for undergraduate programs, and a minimum GPA of 3.0 on a 4.0 scale is required for most graduate programs.

Is French language proficiency required for admission to Laval University?

 Yes, French language proficiency is required for admission to Laval University for most programs. Exceptions are made for programs offered in English or for students whose first language is French.

What is the application deadline for Laval University?

 The application deadline for Laval University varies by program and level of study. It is recommended to check with the specific program of interest for application deadlines and any other important dates.

What is the acceptance rate for Laval University?

 The acceptance rate for Laval University varies by program and level of study. Generally, the acceptance rate for undergraduate programs is around 53%, and the acceptance rate for graduate programs varies widely by program.
